ygData.subject: Q: Begging skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Just for grins I decided to see what I could do with my begging skill (I was already sitting practicing foraging and sense heading - why not?).  For quite some
ygData.messageBody:
Just for grins I decided to see what I could do with my begging skill
(I was already sitting practicing foraging and sense heading - why
not?). For quite some time I bugged NPC's with absolutely no result
other than bringing my skill up to (4). My husband, also curious as
to how quickly one could improve (and probably to not be outdone by a
girl in whatever ability) also played around with it tonight. When
all of the sudden a guard, *not* the one he had targeted and was
"begging" from, came up and killed him. We've looked at the text log
and he didn't *do* anything to warrant this reaction, his faction is
excellent (in Kelethin). Any ideas? Can you irritate these folks to
the point that they'd as soon kill you as give you a copper? Or
should I report it as a bug?

Thanks!

Lliani of Kelethin
Karana server
